Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n7r3q1m08X1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/dQ1fBJoo7sc" width="420"></iframe> <iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Rig_pw-HLko" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>This week’s Video Wednesday is a 2-for-1 special of musical talent. First, listen to <strong><span class="g-hovercard yt-uix-sessionlink yt-user-name ">ferriswheel42</span></strong>'s take on the music of <em>KSP</em> with <em>The Voyage of Jebediah Kerman</em>. For more Jeb goodness, get ready to sing along with <span class="g-hovercard yt-uix-sessionlink yt-user-name "><strong>Pyromobs Coolgames</strong>, who brings us <em>Jebidiah Kerman</em> Song, better referred to as <em>Jeb is Awesome</em>.</span></p>

That second one tho. I'm pretty sure it's supposed to be a parody of a frozen song, but I'm not sure. The sound feels kinda like Frozen.

EDIT: looking at the description for that video, I was right! It's the tune of Let it Go.

1st One: Very nice. Reminiscent of Star Trek. 8/10

2nd One: Completely excruciating. 10/10

First one ... Nice! Good remix

Second one ...... NO just no sorry:/

First: Cool a bit catchy

Second: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH HELP MY EARS ARE ON FIRE *faints*

1: Nice!

2:First I thought, "Come on, guys it can't be that bad." Then I played it. Oh, God, couldn't even listen for five seconds. Is this some sort of way to punish us, Squad?

Edited June 26, 2014 by The Jedi Master

1st song: Really good song.

2nd song: wut

1. Nice, I really like it.

2. Uh...how did this get featured?

2: Squad... are you getting like the devs of

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=274135797

1: Nice.

Also, the second one is

LEEET THE BOOOOOOOOOOOOOSTERS RAIN OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOON

Squad, can't you find something better

Okay. Kudos for trying. Here. If fixed your lyrics. Presenting:

"Kerbal go"

The ice falls off of the rocket tonight,

solid boostahs, to be seen.

Destination set to duna,

the payload to be me.

Sirens sounding as the engines belch and cry

couldn't hold me back, heaven owns my hide!

Houston come in, I'm filled with glee

see my rocket rise over the rolling sea

Unreal though real the sky alone...

The sky I oooooooooooooooown!

Kerbal go, Kerbal go

Crash and burn forevermo-a-oar!

Kerbal go, Kerbal go-aoh-o!

adventure knocking on the door!

Explosion here!

And explosion there!

LEEET THE BOOOOOOOOOOOOOSTERS RAIN OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOON

Kay that's it.

2. Uh...how did this get featured?

It's a young'n trying their heart out and having fun. We're supportive of all
Indeed we are! My vid was pretty stupid xD.

It's a young'n trying their heart out and having fun. We're supportive of all

Indeed. Unfortunately I fear they will never try again because of the negative reaction.
I'm OK with that. Tell the kid I'm sorry.
The first song is OK, but personally, I much prefer the second song.
this man deserves to be in Video Wednesday:

It's a young'n trying their heart out and having fun. We're supportive of all

The author even said it sucked and he didn't know why he was featured.

love it when squad (oops accidental itlics, MObile! oh god. Anyway, feel someone amazing that didn't get toomany views and amsad The author also recieved because of this a lot of negativity, and probably won't make anything again.

It's a young'n trying their heart out and having fun. We're supportive of all

I understand, but your message of "Being Supportive," in this case, resulted in a huge number of "Dislikes" and rude comments on the YouTuber's page. I understand that it's important to feature people of all ages and skill levels, but I don't think that anyone really gained anything from this, including the YouTuber himself.

That being said, it's a cute video that clearly was a lot of fun to make.

[shameless Self-Promotion]

For those of you who aren't too happy with the second video choice, have some music that's a little weird, but not too bad. I hope you like it --

[/shameless Self-Promotion]
No one appreciated my lyrics...

No one appreciated my lyrics...

No, I love them!

1: This is going into my Grand Theft Auto IV Custom Music PlaylistTM!

2: MY EARS ARE BLEEDING!!!!!

It's a young'n trying their heart out and having fun. We're supportive of all

Kraken taketh, Kraken giveth.

Kraken taketh rubbish, Kraken given't thy hoped return.

Thy efforts stateth thy return. Thee must expecteth what thee giveth.

Kraken taketh, Kraken giveth.

But seriously. You can show your support to these "young'ns trying their heart out" by featuring something good. The author even said that his video is stupid, and it doesn't look like much effort was put into it. I can see you're supportive of all, but it's a Video Wednesday. We did not come here to show that we are a loving people! We came for videos made with effort. The maker didn't put any effort into the video worthy of a feature. I know that because he said it sucked. I doubt he was trying his heart out, maybe trying a little, but not enough for it to be featured.

Ban me if you want, but this really ticks me off. I loathe the ARM update, when you and the rest of SQUAD fell for letting NASA turn your game into propaganda. This change is manifesting. I am disappointed.

Edited June 29, 2014 by Naten

<snip>

It's one thing to dislike a video Wednesdays video, but something totally different to say you "loathe" the ARM update and stuff. I do agree with your former points, though. But remember that this thread isn't for complaining about updates - there's other places to do that.

Also, the second video wasn't terrible - I think SQUAD just thought it was cute, which, is sort of is.

Edited June 29, 2014 by Andrew Hansen

I liked the first video. The music is really majestic, ideal for space explorers. The second one is an "alien" version.

Edited August 11, 2014 by TayNebo
